<a id="TextServerManager"></a>

# TextServerManager

**Inherits:** [Object](Object.md)

A singleton for managing [TextServer](TextServer.md) implementations.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**TextServerManager** is the API backend for loading, enumerating, and switching [TextServer](TextServer.md)\\ s.

\ **Note:** Switching text server at runtime is possible, but will invalidate all fonts and text buffers. Make sure to unload all controls, fonts, and themes before doing so.

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

<!-- classref-method -->

`void` **remove_interface**\ (\ interface\: [TextServer](TextServer.md)\ ) [ðŸ”—](#TextServerManager_method_remove_interface)
